name: Comparative analysis of ML and LLM models in S&P500 Prediction
description: An in-depth study comparing traditional Machine Learning models against Large Language Models for financial market prediction.
highlights: Analysed historical S&P500 data over 4 years to identify market trends.
Implemented and compared SVM and LLM based predicitive approaches.
LLM achieved more return than the SVM at the cost of higher risk.
